search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for SafetyCulture (safetyculture.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for SafetyCulture can be found at: [https://safetyculture.com/pricing/](https://safetyculture.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: SafetyCulture offers flexible pricing based on team size and seat types, with a free tier available for small teams.
